text:
Need Victoria Carter for Guzman y Gomez campaign. Budget around $24,981, looking for 2 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x TikTok video, 3 x Product photography, 1 x Pinterest pin. 7 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $24,981 budget

Need to confirm: usage rights
